metadata.description: New characters from books 3-6 (Morning Star, Iron Gold, Dark Age, Light Bringer) requiring DALL-E images
metadata.notes: Physical descriptions compiled from book text and canonical sources. Some characters appear across multiple books.

characters.name: Sefi the Quiet

physicalDescription.build: Tall and powerful, muscular Obsidian warrior woman
physicalDescription.distinguishingFeatures: Stoic demeanor, carries herself with quiet authority, Valkyrie warrior markings

characters.keyVisualTraits: Female Obsidian warrior queen, white hair, pale skin, muscular build, stoic expression, Valkyrie tribal markings, Arctic warrior aesthetic, intimidating presence, sister of Ragnar

characters.name: Holiday ti Nakamura

physicalDescription.distinguishingFeatures: Nutcracker jaw (strong angular jaw), bionic eye, military bearing
physicalDescription.skinTone: From South Pacifica on Earth, likely tan/olive complexion

characters.keyVisualTraits: Female Gray soldier, ashen mohawk hairstyle, bionic/cybernetic eye, strong jaw, military posture, tactical appearance, South Pacific heritage, competent warrior look

characters.name: Trigg ti Nakamura

physicalDescription.distinguishingFeatures: Two gold teardrop tattoos under his right eye, boyish face
physicalDescription.skinTone: From South Pacifica, similar to Holiday

characters.keyVisualTraits: Male Gray soldier, boyish face, two gold teardrop tattoos under right eye, youthful appearance, military gear, Holiday's younger brother, earnest expression

characters.name: Alia Snowsparrow

physicalDescription.build: Older but still imposing Obsidian woman
physicalDescription.distinguishingFeatures: Regal bearing, traditional Obsidian facial markings, tribal queen appearance

characters.keyVisualTraits: The Pale Queen, elderly Obsidian woman, white hair, pale skin, regal and fierce, tribal queen, mother of Ragnar and Sefi, devout believer, arctic ruler aesthetic

characters.name: Romulus au Raa

physicalDescription.distinguishingFeatures: Lost right arm and one eye at Battle of Ilium (Iron Gold), dignified bearing, Rim Gold appearance (more austere than Core Golds)

characters.keyVisualTraits: Moon Lord of Io, Rim Gold aesthetic (more austere/traditional than Core), dignified older warrior, missing right arm and one eye (later books), commanding presence, Japanese-influenced Rim culture aesthetic

characters.name: Regulus ag Sun

physicalDescription.distinguishingFeatures: Wealthy appearance, immaculate grooming, Silver sigils

characters.keyVisualTraits: Richest man in the Society, Silver color (silvery skin tone), refined wealthy businessman appearance, calculating expression, immaculate dress, corporate mogul aesthetic

characters.name: Orion xe Aquarii

physicalDescription.distinguishingFeatures: Blue coloring, neural interface ports, navigator markings

characters.keyVisualTraits: Female Blue navigator/captain, blue-tinged skin, brilliant tactician look, neural interface technology, ship captain demeanor, space navy aesthetic

characters.name: Lilath au Faran

physicalDescription.distinguishingFeatures: Bald head, eel-like predatory eyes, Bonerider captain aesthetic

characters.keyVisualTraits: Female Gold assassin, bald head, eel-like predatory eyes, Jackal's personal killer, Bonerider aesthetic, dangerous and lethal appearance, utterly loyal to Jackal

characters.name: Magnus au Grimmus

physicalDescription.build: Formerly powerful, later emaciated from poison (Iron Gold)
physicalDescription.distinguishingFeatures: Battle scars, war veteran appearance, later shown as dying skeletal husk (Iron Gold)

characters.keyVisualTraits: The Ash Lord, elderly Gold warlord, destroyed Rhea, white/gray hair, cold ruthless expression, military commander appearance, father of Aja, later emaciated and dying from poison

characters.name: Lyria of Lagalos

physicalDescription.distinguishingFeatures: Red coloring, survivor's look, working-class appearance

characters.keyVisualTraits: Young Red woman, red-tinged skin and hair, small build, survivor from mining clan, determined expression, humble origins, evolves from refugee to hero

characters.name: Ephraim ti Horn

physicalDescription.distinguishingFeatures: Drug-worn appearance, former soldier look, haunted expression

characters.keyVisualTraits: Male Gray thief, former Sons of Ares soldier, haunted drug-addicted appearance, widower of Trigg, skilled but broken, eventual redemption arc

characters.name: Dido au Raa

physicalDescription.distinguishingFeatures: Venusian origin, Rim Gold aesthetic, politically ambitious appearance

characters.keyVisualTraits: Female Rim Gold, wife of Romulus, originally from Venus, regal bearing, ambitious political figure, Rim aesthetic (austere, traditional), mother of Seraphina and Diomedes

characters.name: Seraphina au Raa

physicalDescription.distinguishingFeatures: Called 'Little Hawk', fierce warrior appearance, Rim Gold aesthetic

characters.keyVisualTraits: Young female Rim Gold warrior, called Little Hawk, daughter of Romulus, athletic warrior build, fierce determination, killed Cassius in duel, Rim aesthetic

characters.name: Diomedes au Raa

physicalDescription.distinguishingFeatures: Olympic Knight bearing, trained by Lorn au Arcos, stoic Rim warrior appearance

characters.keyVisualTraits: The Storm Knight of the Rim, Olympic Knight, male Rim Gold, powerful warrior build, trained by Lorn au Arcos, stoic and honorable, traditional Rim aesthetic

characters.name: Atalantia au Grimmus

physicalDescription.distinguishingFeatures: Last surviving Fury (after Aja), deadly warrior appearance, commanding presence

characters.keyVisualTraits: The Last Fury, female Gold warrior, daughter of the Ash Lord, predatory appearance, Dictator of Society, deadly and commanding, sister of Aja aesthetic

characters.name: Apollonius au Valii-Rath

physicalDescription.distinguishingFeatures: The Minotaur, flamboyant appearance, narcissistic grooming, theatrical presence

characters.keyVisualTraits: The Minotaur, extremely tall Gold male, flamboyant and narcissistic, flowing golden hair, theatrical personality, eloquent and dangerous, magnificent warrior

characters.name: Atlas au Raa

physicalDescription.distinguishingFeatures: The Fear Knight, psychological warfare expert, unsettling calm demeanor

characters.keyVisualTraits: The Fear Knight, male Rim Gold, brother of Romulus, master torturer, cold calculating appearance, Gorgon commander, unsettling calm, psychological terror expert

characters.name: The Duke of Hands

physicalDescription.distinguishingFeatures: Carries white cane topped with octopus head, crimelord aesthetic, Pink beauty with sinister edge

characters.keyVisualTraits: Male Pink crimelord, white cane with octopus head, Syndicate aesthetic, refined but sinister, beautiful Pink features with criminal menace

characters.name: The Syndicate Queen

physicalDescription.distinguishingFeatures: Mysterious leader, commands absolute fear, identity hidden

characters.keyVisualTraits: Mysterious Pink female, Syndicate leader, shrouded in mystery, commands fear, criminal queen, identity secret

characters.name: Volga Fjorgan

physicalDescription.distinguishingFeatures: Pale skin, white hair, deemed 'defective' by Society breeding program, daughter of Ragnar Volarus

characters.keyVisualTraits: Female Obsidian, huge and pale, white hair, daughter of Ragnar, gentle nature contrasting with size, loyal friend, granddaughter of Volsung Fa

characters.name: Liam

physicalDescription.distinguishingFeatures: Lyria's nephew, child survivor, initially blind

characters.keyVisualTraits: Young Red boy, Lyria's nephew, sole family survivor, innocent child, initially damaged eyes (later healed)

characters.name: Alexandar au Arcos

physicalDescription.distinguishingFeatures: Grandson of Lorn au Arcos, carries family honor, called 'The Griffin' and 'Pup One'

characters.keyVisualTraits: Young male Gold warrior, grandson of Lorn au Arcos, athletic build, honorable bearing, called The Griffin, Darrow's archLancer, killed by Lysander

characters.name: Wulfgar

physicalDescription.distinguishingFeatures: ArchWarden of Republic, carries Ragnar's legacy, respected leader

characters.keyVisualTraits: Male Obsidian warrior, ArchWarden, massive build, carries Ragnar's legacy, Republic loyalist, dignified warrior

characters.name: Ajax au Grimmus

physicalDescription.distinguishingFeatures: Son of Aja and Atlas, Iron Leopards Legate, seeking to prove himself

characters.keyVisualTraits: Male Gold warrior, son of Aja and Atlas, The Storm Knight, Iron Leopards commander, powerful warrior seeking glory, rivals Lysander

characters.name: Rhonna of Lykos

physicalDescription.distinguishingFeatures: Darrow's niece, Howler lancer, called 'Pup Two'

characters.keyVisualTraits: Young female Red warrior, Darrow's niece, Howler lancer, fierce fighter, called Pup Two, partner to Alexandar

characters.name: Thraxa au Telemanus

physicalDescription.distinguishingFeatures: Kavax's daughter, fights with warhammer, called The Hammer

characters.keyVisualTraits: Female Gold warrior, Kavax's daughter, The Hammer, fights with warhammer, muscular powerful build, Telemanus red hair, fierce warrior

characters.name: Kalindora au San

physicalDescription.distinguishingFeatures: The Love Knight, Olympic Knight, aunt to Alexandar, romantic interest to Lysander

characters.keyVisualTraits: Female Gold, Olympic Knight, The Love Knight, aunt to Alexandar au Arcos, elegant warrior, later romantically involved with Lysander

characters.name: Volsung Fa

physicalDescription.distinguishingFeatures: The Allfather, father of Ragnar and Sefi, ancient warrior markings, legendary presence

characters.keyVisualTraits: The Allfather, legendary male Obsidian warlord, massive build, ancient warrior, white/gray hair, father of Ragnar and Sefi, grandfather of Volga, came from beyond Kuiper Belt

characters.name: Valdir

physicalDescription.distinguishingFeatures: Sefi's lover, Obsidian warrior

characters.keyVisualTraits: Male Obsidian warrior, Sefi's romantic partner, massive build, loyal warrior

characters.name: Cadus Harnassus

physicalDescription.distinguishingFeatures: Orange engineer, Imperator of Republic, practical demeanor

characters.keyVisualTraits: Male Orange engineer, Darrow's Imperator, practical engineer appearance, Republic military leader, competent and reliable

characters.name: Pax Augustus

physicalDescription.distinguishingFeatures: Son of Darrow and Mustang, named after Pax au Telemanus, golden hair like mother

characters.keyVisualTraits: Young male Gold, son of Darrow and Virginia, golden hair like mother, named after Pax au Telemanus, heir to Republic, brave young Gold

characters.name: Electra au Barca

physicalDescription.distinguishingFeatures: Daughter of Sevro and Victra, fierce spirit, takes after parents

characters.keyVisualTraits: Young female Gold, daughter of Sevro and Victra, fierce spirit, takes after both parents, wild and brave

characters.name: Pytha

physicalDescription.distinguishingFeatures: Blue pilot, helped Cassius survive exile, loyal companion

characters.keyVisualTraits: Female Blue pilot, helped Cassius survive, loyal companion, space pilot aesthetic, Blue coloring

characters.name: Aurae

physicalDescription.distinguishingFeatures: Pink companion who helped Cassius, left Darrow a book

characters.keyVisualTraits: Female Pink, beautiful Pink features, helped Cassius during exile, compassionate, left meaningful book for Darrow

characters.name: Pax (baby)

physicalDescription.distinguishingFeatures: Darrow and Virginia's infant son at end of Morning Star, golden hair

characters.keyVisualTraits: Baby Gold, son of Darrow and Virginia, golden hair, newborn revealed at end of Morning Star (same character as pax-augustus, earlier)

characters.name: Figment

physicalDescription.distinguishingFeatures: Mysterious figure who implanted parasite in Lyria, Syndicate operative

characters.keyVisualTraits: Mysterious Syndicate operative, implanted parasite in Lyria, shadowy figure, identity unclear

characters.name: Ulysses au Barca

physicalDescription.distinguishingFeatures: Victra and Sevro's infant son, killed by Harmony

characters.keyVisualTraits: Infant Gold, son of Sevro and Victra, killed by Harmony and Red Hand, tragic victim

characters.name: Deanna of Lykos

physicalDescription.distinguishingFeatures: Darrow's mother, aged appearance, miner's wife

characters.keyVisualTraits: Elderly Red woman, Darrow's mother, gray hair, weathered appearance, miner's wife, loving mother figure
